## AlCabinet.exists() method

Checks to see if a property is present in the cabinet.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
exists(property: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  property | <code>string</code> | The name of the property. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

`true` if the property exists, `false` otherwise.
